title: Orly Smartgels, Kiss The Bride, 0.18 Fluid Ounce
description: As one of the nail care industry's renowned color houses. Orly seasonally introduces new collections and updates its array of permanent lacquers. By diligently analyzing fashion trends and precisely custom blending hues, Orly has established a dynamic palette composed of subtle sheers, vivid cremes, dazzling shimmers, smooth glitters and hot neon. Kiss The Bride is a happy medium between a light peach and light pink that will give your nails lots of color with lots of glitter that will add dazzling sparkle and shine to your nails that will make you feel like the beautiful bride you are.

title: IBD Just Gel INFINITELY CURIOUS Soak Off Orange Nail Polish UV Manicure .5oz LED
description: IBD introduces just gel, the strong 100% pure gel formula that wears like a classic true gel. Apply it just like polish and be rewarded with richer, more even color. This versatile gel polish cures quickly under either LED or UV light. It also protects natural nails with stronger, long-lasting wear. Gel removal is simple as well. Remove Just Gel Polish easily in just 10 minutes with no mess and no fuss.Instructions:File and shape nailRemove and push back cuticleBuff nail to remove shine and dustApply foundation and cure 1 minuteApply thin coat of color to nails and cure for 2 minutesApply second coat of color and cure for 2 minutesApply top coat and cure for 2 minutesCleanse nail to ensure mirror finish
